title: Choose Your Session Date
subtitle: Select a date and time that works best for your schedule
urgencyMessage: HURRY! These sessions typically fill up 7-10 days before the start date.

cantMakeIt.title: Can't Make These Dates?
cantMakeIt.description: Join our WhatsApp Hub to receive notifications about new session dates. You'll also gain access to free resources, exclusives from guest speakers and community support.
